game.name: Snipers Wars
game.description:
It is a time to showcase your snipping skills by challenging players from all over the world in a multiplayer army game: Snipers Wars. This brand new adventure game is to all those who love shooting. It takes you to a battlefield of snippers where you will have to fight against the worldwide players. It is in your hand how you want to kill your opponents. Well, a proper slow aiming will definitely help to aim your target and shoot the opposing soldiers more accurately.  

Make sure that you have practiced properly how to operate your gun or other useful weapons to kill your opponents. Use the zoom feature to find out the location of your opponents. There are three different maps to choose from and explore your snipping fantasy. Select from 2 to 10 players in each map. Play this free online war game with full of confidence to be awarded of being recalled the best snipper player of all.  

Create your own room where you will have to meet with different types of battles or get ready to connect to a server where players from all across the world will be waiting for you. Decide the way to kill your enemies and dive deep into the intense battle in this one of the most popular 3D multiplayer adventure games for boys. The more you accurate, the better you will kill. Join your team and start playing this cool war game. Controls: WASD for movement and mouse for shooting. Use R to reload, shift to run, B to shop, T to chat, Y to team chat, spacebar to jump, C to crouch and Tab for Menu.
